Aotus azarai.EditorialNote: This class is not intended to present a normative, comprehensive, taxonomic hierarchy, but rather is provided as an approximate indication of the phylogenetic relatedness amongst the taxonomic groups nested under it (BB)., As the Family listed in NCBI Tax (Aotidae) is currently listed as an unconfirmed Family taxon name in GBIF, GBIF lists this genus under the Cebidae family.
